column5: The PortletContext.getClassLoader method returns the class loader for this portlet application.
The PortletContext.getContextPath method returns the context path for this portlet application.
The PortletContext.getEffectiveMinorVersion method returns the minor version of the Portlet API used by the portlet application running in this PortletContext.
The PortletContext.getEffectiveMajorVersion method returns the major version of the Portlet API used by the portlet application running in this PortletContext.
